post.body: Don't stop in Las Vegas on the way back... it's bat country.
Crawl out from unda that big old rock and check out these new flossy flossy threads I'm flossin'!!
Huugs for the Mikeys!! Your repentance isn't complete, though. Next stop: http://tinyurl.com/g9g7e
QuickBooks is the obvious answer. It's substance over style -- gotta look past the ugliness. They can try the free trial...
That's why scientists prefer the term "Global Climate Change" and shun the usage of "Global Warming" =)
aww, hoooooogs!
¿Por Qué Es Eso?
Ahh, the hazards of a dotcom office. =)
Oh yeah? Go look at garybear62 on my Flickr contacts page. His beard wins all fights and saves children from broken homes.
Tech is the *only* way to do it.
Passive Aggressive Pete sez "@user" is a splendid way to start your tweets.
You want to make a Yaz record.
I hear you're buying a synthesizer and an arpeggiator and throwing your computer out the window, because you want to make something real.
Fraajeelee... Must be Italian.
On the 7th day, God wrote Hot Chip's "One Pure Thought"...
Back from drinks in soma, now catching up on episodes of Chelsea Lately...
Nothing's more uncomfortable than being embarrassed on someone else's behalf -- especially when they're oblivious to it all.
I want to repeatedly inflict pain upon Fred Figglehorn with a blunt, tetanus-laden metal pipe. Wait, I don't want to, I NEED TO!
RT @jwz The bathroom attendant... ...just said, "welcome back". That's creepy. This man is paying too much attention to my urinary function.
My tweet signal-to-noise ratio is a joke. Time to employ Twitterific's filtering. =(
